Alert AdminAspen going to main board on 28 Jan  congratulations! But the current market capitalization is 1 083 269 594 x $0.255 = $276.23 millions.In order to move up to main board  the market capitalization of not less than $300 million. So on 18 nov 2020  100 000 000 placement shares completed.So to satisfy the SGX requirements  the shares price has to raise on order to meet. Example: 1 083 269 594 shares x $0.28 = $303.315 millionsSo tomorrow they need to increase the share price to $0.28. Hope this new will happen tomorrow.
